name: Wishiwashi School Form
description: The Small Fry Pokémon. Wishiwashi assemble in this formation to face off against strong foes. It boasts a strength that earned it the name “demon of the sea.”

abilities.name: Schooling
abilities.description: Beginning at level 5, this Pokémon may change to School Form as a free action when it begins its turn above 25% of its maximum health. In School Form, the Pokémon adds 5 to its AC and Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution ability scores (Additional CON does not alter this Pokemon's HP in this form). The Pokémon reverts back to Solo Form when it falls below 25% of maximum health, and must complete a short rest before activating this ability again.
